ygData.subject: RE: New Tinkering Web Site!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Got a lot of catching up to do in this newsgroup, but thought I d respond to this one right away for those who don t know. Here is a replacement to Gnomads
ygData.messageBody:
Got a lot of catching up to do in this newsgroup, but thought I'd respond to
this one right away for those who don't know.

Here is a replacement to Gnomads Tinker site and it looks pretty darn good!

It is Fulcrums Tinkering Web site at:

http://www.geocities.com/eqtinker/ <http://www.geocities.com/eqtinker/>

Now we can get back to business. =)

Kilkin Cobblepot - 37th Gemchopper - Fen Ro


-----Original Message-----
From: gina@... [mailto:gina@...]
Sent: Monday, December 13, 1999 4:13 PM
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] Gnomad is gone! What happened
to the research?!?!

From: gina@...

Since Gnomad's guide is gone, what will we do now? I cant
find any other informative guide on the net that has recipies!

Does anyone have a old copy of gnomads pages to send to me?
Or perhaps a recipie list/trivial list to send to me?

Anything at this point is appreciated...I just made my
tinkering level and the best guide out there has been deleted!

ACK!

Send replys or guides to Manga@... (my email on
onelist is defunct and i cant seem to change it)
